attributes.action: Stop BT hold a monoply on the instalation of land lines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BT should not be allowed to dominate the market place in the way they do for the installation of phones. They are the only company who can apparently install phone lines in new homes. i thought we lived in a society of open competition. this is clearly not the case. An individual should at least have an option as to who installs their land line. This world lead to healthy competition through out the market place.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
